Body:
account_xpub = self.do_command(self.dev_args + ['getxpub', 'm/84h/1h/0h'])[
    'xpub']
p2sh_segwit_account_xpub = self.do_command(self.dev_args + ['getxpub',
    'm/49h/1h/0h'])['xpub']
legacy_account_xpub = self.do_command(self.dev_args + ['getxpub',
    'm/44h/1h/0h'])['xpub']
result = self.do_command(self.dev_args + ['displayaddress', '--desc', 
    'wpkh([' + self.fingerprint + '/84h/1h/0h]' + account_xpub + '/0/0)'])
self.assertNotIn('error', result)
self.assertNotIn('code', result)
self.assertIn('address', result)
result = self.do_command(self.dev_args + ['displayaddress', '--desc', 
    'wpkh([' + self.fingerprint + '/84h/1h/0h]' + xpub_to_pub_hex(
    account_xpub) + '/0/0)'])
self.assertNotIn('error', result)
self.assertNotIn('code', result)
self.assertIn('address', result)
result = self.do_command(self.dev_args + ['displayaddress', '--desc', 
    'sh(wpkh([' + self.fingerprint + '/49h/1h/0h]' +
    p2sh_segwit_account_xpub + '/0/0))'])
self.assertNotIn('error', result)
self.assertNotIn('code', result)
self.assertIn('address', result)
result = self.do_command(self.dev_args + ['displayaddress', '--desc', 
    'pkh([' + self.fingerprint + '/44h/1h/0h]' + legacy_account_xpub + '/0/0)']
    )
self.assertNotIn('error', result)
self.assertNotIn('code', result)
self.assertIn('address', result)
result = self.do_command(self.dev_args + ['displayaddress', '--desc', 
    'wpkh([' + self.fingerprint + '/84h/1h/0h]' + 'not_and_xpub' + '/0/0)'])
self.assertIn('error', result)
self.assertIn('code', result)
self.assertEqual(result['code'], -7)
result = self.do_command(self.dev_args + ['displayaddress', '--desc', 
    'wpkh([' + self.fingerprint + '/84h/1h/0h]' + 'not_and_xpub' + '/0/0)'])
self.assertIn('error', result)
self.assertIn('code', result)
self.assertEqual(result['code'], -7)
self.do_command(self.dev_args + ['displayaddress', '--desc', 
    'wpkh([00000000/84h/1h/0h]' + account_xpub + '/0/0)'])
self.assertIn('error', result)
self.assertIn('code', result)
self.assertEqual(result['code'], -7)
